rounds.comments: (Alex: We'll give you an ungrammatical line from a song; you correct it.)

clues.text:
The Rolling Stones:
"I can't get no satisfaction"

The Doors:
"'Til the stars fall from the sky for you and I"
clues.response: "'Til the stars fall from the sky for you and me"

clues.text:
Paul McCartney & Wings:
"If this ever-changing world in which we live in makes you give in and cry"
clues.response: "If this ever-changing world in which we live makes you give in and cry"

clues.text:
Prince:
"If I was your girlfriend, would you remember to tell me...?"
clues.response: "If I were your girlfriend, would you remember to tell me...?"

clues.text:
Elvis Presley:
"Love me tender, love me dear, tell me you are mine"
clues.response: "Love me tenderly, love me dear, tell me you are mine"
